Plot: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love for her.
Writer: Niranjan Iyengar (dialogue), Karan Johar (screenplay), Karan Johar (story)
Title: Kal Ho Naa Ho
Actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Saif Ali Khan, Jaya Bhaduri
